Argument.Name: uniqueName
Argument.Description: arbitrary unique name to identify the queue among all registered queues

Argument.Name: externalName
Argument.Description: actual name of the queue used by the external queue provider

Argument.Name: queueType
Argument.Description: Type of queue (Possible values: ORACLE_AQ, WEBSPHERE_MQ, ACTIVE_MQ)

Argument.Name: connectParameters
Argument.Description: Additional parameters needed to create a connection to the queue, depending on queue type (ORACLE_AQ: username, password, Jdbc URL; WEBSPHERE_MQ: queueManager, hostname, port, channel; ACTIVE_MQ: hostname, port)
